title: Conversational Interface For Weather
description: Dissertation Project. A mobile app along with a webserver to facilitate communication with a LLM for real weather information, a conversational method for information delivery.

title: Todo App
description: A Expo mobile for creating tasks, and upon complete receiving points and motivational messages.

title: Payroll System
description: For an assignment we were task with operating as if we were part of a large organisation and our team was in charge of the payroll system for this organisation.

title: Prototype Web-Store
description: A prototype web store using flask.

title: Weather Data Entry Site
description: A simple flask web site for entering weather data. Was part of my university teaching to learn javascript and flask.

title: Stocks Trading Simulator
description: My A-Level project using tkinter, it gathers real data relating to stocks to allow the simulated buying and selling of these stocks.
